techs.name: Advanced Economics II

techs.name: Better Land Transport
techs.quote: 'I really do encourage other manufacturers to bring electric cars to market. It's a good thing, and they need to bring it to market and keep iterating and improving and make better and better electric cars, and that's what going to result in humanity achieving a sustainable transport future. I wish it was growing faster than it is.' - Elon Musk.

techs.name: Reactive Armour
techs.quote: 'Reactive armour is a type of vehicle armour used in protecting vehicles, especially modern tanks, against shaped charges and hardened kinetic energy penetrators. The most common type is explosive reactive armour, but variants include self-limiting explosive reactive armour, non-energetic reactive armour, non-explosive reactive armour, and electric armour.' - Wikipedia.
